dataItem.title: Supermodel swaps high heels for high hopes in Peru
dataItem.dscr: The world is used to seeing Jessica Gomes - model, actress and the face of David Jones - immersed in the glamourous high fashion scene.

dataItem.title: Help Syrian refugees in crisis
dataItem.dscr: Almost five years of conflict in Syria has left more than four million refugees seeking shelter in neighbouring countries, and countless more struggling to reach safety in Europe. An increasing number of those fleeing the Syrian conflict are unaccompanied children.
